item.description:
Please join the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club and its members the weekend of October 4-5th for a Fall Foliage weekend in the White Mountains of New Hampshire.

Schedule:

• Arrive Friday night anytime after 7:30PM. Beer & Sangria from 9-Midnight
• Saturday we will Hike Mt. Jackson which ranks 38 on the official New Hampshire 4000 footer list, and lies in the southern Presidential Range along the Appalachian Trail. We will depart for the hike from the Wedeln Ski Club at 8:30AM
• The hike should only take 5 hours and relaxing cookout is planned to follow beginning at 5:30PM
• Sunday for those interested we will plan a short hike and/or 25 mile bike ride around North Conway.

Food:

Breakfast:
SATURDAY: Served from 7-8:15AM Cost $3/per person
• Continental (assorted breads, muffins, bagels)
• Coffee, Orange Juice
SUNDAY: Served from 8:30-10AM Cost $5/per person
• Eggs, Bacon, toast & assorted bagels with cream cheese
• Coffee, Orange Juice

Dinner:
SATURDAY: begins at 5:30PM Cost $25/per person
• Beer, Wine & Soda
• Hamburgers, Cheeseburgers, Chicken breasts, BBQ Ribs, veggie burgers
• Potato Salad & Garden Salad
• Cookies

Overnight Accommodations:
Wedeln Ski & Sports Club, Bartlett, NH $20/night/person

Getting There:
The major trails for Mt. Jackson all originate from N.H.
Route 302. From the south, take Route 93 to Route 3
just after Franconia Notch and turn right on Route
302. From the east, take Route 302 from N.H. Route
16 in N. Conway and travel to Crawford Notch.

For directions to the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club &
more information: www.wedeln.com

See attached flyer for full details on the hike

PLEASE RSVP no later than Wednesday October 1, 2008 at midnight.
http://files.meetup.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Audra, Jonathan or Michele when you arrive at the house.
item.name: Wedeln Fall Foliage Hike & Bike Weekend
